description:
A scandalous picture of Takato with Junta has been published in the tabloids. With suspicions of "Forbidden Love," Takato becomes the target of society`s attention in a negative way.  How will Junta and Takato fair in this storm?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If You`re That in Love with Me, You Can Have Your Way with Me Until You`re Done.
Sonna ni Ore ni Horetennara, Akiru made Dakasete Yaru yo.
そんなに俺に惚れてんなら, 飽きるまで抱かせてやるよ.
